name: Astro Control
description:
After being stranded in the cold grasp of space, our captain of the space shuttle FERo decides to go on a life or death mission for her last chance at survival. The only catch is that damage to her ship means that she will loose control of one of her directional jets.

A simple game that I made as my first real try at game making hope you guys enjoy it and I'm looking forward for feat back.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
